name: tm67
effect: Teaches Recycle to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Retaliate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Recycle)

flavor_text.black-white: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack’s damage increases.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack’s damage increases.
